TopicTitle: Tanks starting empty and decoupling bugs

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure whats going, but I have no fuel in some tanks. Sometimes its the second stage, and oddly a few times the first stage. Also, decoupling issues where the rockets remain intact. Manual decoupling works, but stage decoupling does not.

The decoupling you can manually decouple to avoid the issue. Works fine that way. The fuel issue, I have no clue how to fix. Or I would be on Mun already.

 

Windows 11
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti 
13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900K

 

 

Edited February 26, 2023 by Sal

6 minutes ago, Sal said:

I'm not sure whats going, but I have no fuel in some tanks. Sometimes its the second stage, and oddly a few times the first stage. Also, decoupling issues where the rockets remain intact. Manual decoupling works, but stage decoupling does not.

The fuel leakage issue seems to be associated with certain landing legs.
No landing legs to be found. Orbital craft. Parachutes only.

keep the fuel distribution window open as you launch to monitor the levels in the tanks, see what's happening

Edited February 26, 2023 by Sea_Kerman

They seem perfectly full right before next stage. Then, nothing after stage seperation.

For now I'm using 2 separate fuel types in my stages. This workaround at least lets me play for now. Along with manual decoupling.
